scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run docs && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating docs"
scripts.clean: npm run pre-clean && npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.update: ncu -u && git diff --quiet || npm install && npm audit fix
scripts.update-clean: npm run pre-clean && npm run update
scripts.update-commit: npm run update && npm test && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies"
scripts.update-patch: npm run update && npm test && git add --all && git diff HEAD --quiet || git commit -m "Updating dependencies" && npm version patch
scripts.docs:bar: exec-each src/barChart.js --out docs/{basefile}.md jsdoc2md -- {path} -t node_modules/dmd-readable/docs.hbs --plugin dmd-readable
scripts.docs:box: exec-each src/boxChart.js --out docs/{basefile}.md jsdoc2md -- {path} -t node_modules/dmd-readable/docs.hbs --plugin dmd-readable
scripts.docs:stackedBar: exec-each src/stackedBarChart.js --out docs/{basefile}.md jsdoc2md -- {path} -t node_modules/dmd-readable/docs.hbs --plugin dmd-readable
scripts.docs:readme: jsdoc2md index.ts src/**/*.js > README.md -t node_modules/dmd-readable/overview.hbs --plugin dmd-readable/overview-plugin.js
